_comment: Adobe Stock Image Processor Configuration Example
_description: This file shows all available configuration options with explanations

processing._comment: Image processing and batch management settings
processing._batch_size_comment: Number of images per batch (1-10000). Higher = more memory usage, potentially faster
processing._max_workers_comment: Maximum worker threads (1-32). Recommend 1-2x CPU cores
processing._checkpoint_interval_comment: Save progress every N images (1-1000). Lower = better resume, more I/O

quality._min_sharpness_comment: Minimum sharpness score (â‰¥0). Typical range: 50-200. Higher = more strict
quality._max_noise_level_comment: Maximum noise level (0-1). 0=no noise, 1=max noise. Lower = more strict
quality._min_resolution_comment: Minimum [width, height] pixels. Adobe Stock typically needs high resolution

similarity._comment: Duplicate and similar image detection settings
similarity._hash_threshold_comment: Perceptual hash distance (0-64). Lower = detect more similar images
similarity._feature_threshold_comment: Deep learning similarity (0-1). Higher = detect more similar images
similarity._clustering_eps_comment: DBSCAN clustering parameter (0-2). Lower = tighter clusters

compliance._comment: Adobe Stock compliance and legal checking
compliance._logo_detection_confidence_comment: Logo detection threshold (0-1). Higher = fewer false positives
compliance._face_detection_enabled_comment: Enable face detection for privacy compliance

decision._comment: Decision engine weights and thresholds - weights must sum to 1.0
decision._approval_threshold_comment: Overall score needed for automatic approval
decision._rejection_threshold_comment: Overall score below which images are rejected

output._images_per_folder_comment: Images per subfolder (1-10000). Adobe Stock batch upload recommendation
output._preserve_metadata_comment: Keep original EXIF data and keywords
output._generate_thumbnails_comment: Create thumbnail images for HTML reports

logging._level_comment: Log level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR, CRITICAL
logging._file_comment: Log file name (relative to app directory)
logging._max_file_size_comment: Max log size before rotation (format: number + B/KB/MB/GB/TB)
logging._backup_count_comment: Number of backup log files to keep (0-100)
